title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the MLB watch app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to launch the app without issue 
AND will land on the Scoreboard page

title: Logos and Names
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN all team names and logos appear correctly and up to date

title: Match iPhone Scoreboard App
custom_preconds: GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
custom_steps: When the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_expected: THEN the games listed should match the games scheduled for that date

title: Sort Order - "My Teams"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
and the user has a team(s) set to "My Teams" on the iPhone app
custom_steps: When the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_expected:
THEN the games listed on the watch should be in the same order as the iPhone app's Scoreboard
with the team(s) from the "My Teams" settings sorted at the top

title: Sort Order - Game States
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
and there are games scheduled
custom_steps: When the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_expected:
THEN the games listed on the watch should be in the same order as the iPhone app's Scoreboard
and will be properly sorted based off of their game state

title: Date Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the date on the top of the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN user display with Yesterday date, Current Date and Tomorrow's Date selection 
AND user can pick one of the 3

title: Select New Date from Date Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND taps on the date to launch the date picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on another date
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to view the games scheduled for the newly selected date

title: Linescore - RHE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on watch's Scoreboard page
AND the game row is expanded for a game in Live or Final
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the linescore
custom_expected:
THEN the linescore will be displayed with the Runs (R) for both teams being bold
AND the Hits (H) and Errors (E) not bold

title: Linescore - Inning Indicator (Top)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on watch's Scoreboard page
AND is viewing the linescore for a game in Live
custom_steps: WHEN the game is in the top of an inning
custom_expected: THEN the inning indicator will be displayed on the top portion of the linescore

title: Linescore - Inning Indicator (Bot)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on watch's Scoreboard page
AND is viewing the linescore for a game in Live
custom_steps: WHEN the game is in the bottom of an inning
custom_expected: THEN the inning indicator will be displayed on the bottom portion of the linescore

title: Linescore - Inning Indicator (Mid)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on watch's Scoreboard page
AND is viewing the linescore for a game in Live
custom_steps: WHEN the game is in the middle of an inning
custom_expected: THEN the inning indicator will not be displayed on the linescore

title: Linescore - Inning Indicator (End)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on watch's Scoreboard page
AND is viewing the linescore for a game in Live
custom_steps: When the game is in the end of an inning
custom_expected: THEN the inning indicator will not be displayed on the linescore

title: Game Time TBD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game with a TBD start time
custom_expected: Then the user will see the "TBD" indicator instead of a time

title: Postponed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Postponed
custom_expected: Then the user will see the Postponed indicator instead of the time

title: Delayed Start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in delayed start
custom_expected: Then the user will see the delayed indicator (Del.)

title: Final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Final - Completed Early
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final that was completed early
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text and innings (ex: Final/6)
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Final - Extra Innings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed on the watch
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final that ended in extra innings
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text and innings (ex: Final/11)
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Standings Tab
custom_preconds: Given a user MLB app installed on the watch
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app and slides right to view the standings page
custom_expected: Then the user should see the full Standings page

title: Clinch Indicators
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed on the watch
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the watch app and slides right to view the Standings tab
and a team has clinched a playoff spot
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the full Standings page
AND the playoff legend of (w, x y and z) will appear at the bottom of the page

title: Table Headers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has MLB app installed on watch
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the Standings tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to view the AL and NL headers
AND will be able to scroll up and down on the page

title: Team Information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has MLB app installed on the watch
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on standings page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see all teams' information with team logos

title: "My Team" Standings
custom_preconds:
Given a user MLB app installed on the watch
and has set a team under "My Teams"
custom_steps: When the user navigates to Standings on the watch
custom_expected:
Then that team's league table should be shown first
and depending on what league that team is in, the rest of that league's divisions will be listed
followed by the other league's divisions

(for example, if Atlanta Braves are set team, then the NL East will be first, followed by the other NL divisions, followed by the AL divisions)

title: No Teams set to "My Teams"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB app is installed on iPhone and Apple Watch
and does not have a team set to "My Teams"
custom_steps: WHEN the user customizes their watch face with the MLB complication
custom_expected:
THEN The complication should display
and should show how many games are scheduled for that day

title: Background Fetcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has MLB app installed on a watch
and has a team set to "My Teams" on the iPhone MLB app
and has added the app's complication 
and the team has a game in progress
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the complication
custom_expected: THEN The linescore in the complication should update every 10-15 mins

title: "My Teams" - Preview
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on the watch
and has added the complication
and has set a team to "My Teams" on the iPhone MLB app
and the team has a game on that date, that is not yet live
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the complication
custom_expected: THEN the team's matchup of that date will appear

title: "My Teams" - Preview (Off Day)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on the watch
and has added the complication
and has set a team to "My Teams" on the iPhone MLB app
and the team has an off day
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the complication
custom_expected: THEN the team's matchup of their next game will appear

title: "My Teams" - Linescore
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on the watch
and has added the complication
and has set a team to "My Teams" on the iPhone MLB app
and the team has a game in progress or Final on that date
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the complication
custom_expected: THEN the linescore will be displayed with the Runs (R) for both teams being bold
